alert.note: Alert for Collin; Fannin; Grayson; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 9:24PM CDT until April 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northeastern Collin County in north central Texas... Southeastern Grayson County in north central Texas... Southwestern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 924 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Anna, or 9 miles northeast of McKinney, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McKinney, Greenville, Anna, Princeton, Farmersville, Van Alstyne, Howe, Leonard, Whitewright, Wolfe City, Celeste, Bailey, Melissa, Blue Ridge, Trenton, New Hope, Weston and Westminster. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
